panels.description: Wolumen transakcji klienta w czasie, pogrupowany po typie operacji (np. redemption/topup/reversal/balance).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS tx_type,
  count() AS txns
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, tx_type
ORDER BY time, tx_type

panels.title: Tx volume by transaction type

panels.description: Wolumen transakcji klienta w czasie po kanałach/protokołach. Pozwala szybko wykryć czy problem jest kanałowy.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['protocol']), dimensions['protocol'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['channel']), dimensions['channel'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['transport']), dimensions['transport'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS protocol,
  count() AS txns
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, protocol
ORDER BY time, protocol

panels.title: Tx volume by protocol/channel

panels.description: Skuteczność biznesowa (z perspektywy klienta) w czasie per typ operacji. Spadki wskazują regresje flow biznesowego.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS tx_type,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, tx_type
ORDER BY time, tx_type

panels.title: Business success by transaction type

panels.description: Ranking typów i protokołów po wolumenie z metrykami jakości i RTT (średnia/p95/max).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS tx_type,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['protocol']), dimensions['protocol'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['channel']), dimensions['channel'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['transport']), dimensions['transport'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS protocol,
  count() AS txns,
  avg(processorDurationMs) AS avg_rtt_ms,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_rtt_ms,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS business_success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY tx_type, protocol
ORDER BY txns DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Top transaction segments (volume, quality, RTT)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId
list.label: Swarm
list.name: swarm
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
list.label: Call ID
list.name: callId
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
